description:
Display an AI-assisted creation flow where users answer 3-4 simple questions (topic, target audience, key message) and the system generates a starter outline with suggested sections and placeholder content they can refine.

**Rationale:** Policy briefs require specific structure and expertise. Starting from scratch is intimidating. AI scaffolding lowers the barrier to entry while teaching users the expected format through example.
title: Policy Brief Empty State with AI Co-Creation Prompt
